Summary: Almost like a star-however it changed colors slowly. It appeared to look like a star and a plane mixed
divs: Sighting DetailsI was standing outside of an opening from the woods and there appeared to be a star that was changing colors. It almost looked like a plane was coming towards us with all the lights, but it never moved. We went home and our house was the direction towards it, but it never got bigger. This was all around 9:00pm. I was not very scared, I thought it was cool. I am not saying this is in fact a UFO, but I do not know what it was.
trends: There have been 26 other sightings in Harrisburg
There were no other sightings in Harrisburg on or around May 1st 2013
